name: AOK Adventures Of Kok
description:
You're Kok, leader of the Ghost squad. After awakening Kok notices that he found himself in an unknown universe. Escape from this place and return to your home world.

★ Easter eggs
★ Crazy difficulty level
★ Easy intuitive control
★ Different lovely and terrible enemies
★ Different locations, you can and get lost
★ Russian and English languages
★ Everything is procedurally generated, a huge world with many unique levels
